QuestData.Title: Warlord of Draenor
QuestData.Description: The Exarchs do nothing but squabble amongst themselves over petty issues while our people are slaughtered in their homes by orc filth. If they will not raise a fist of defiance against our enemies, I will.$B$BI wish to join your Alliance and rid this world of Horde. ALL HORDE - "Iron" or otherwise.$B$BThis Altar of Bones that I stand upon represents glory in battle against our Horde enemy. Place an offering upon it and earn a conqueror's tribute worthy of your unrelenting bloodthirst.$B$BKill. Them. All.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Enemy Players in Player versus Player combat to earn 20 Broken Bones then place an offering at the Altar of Bones to Earn a Conqueror's Tribute.
QuestData.RewardText: It is a start, to be certain, but there is much work to be done if Draenor is to be saved. Show no mercy, for they will show none to you.$B$BThe only warlords left upon Draenor will be you and I.
